effect.name: TAP Pitch Shifter
effect.description:
TAP Pitch Shifter (LADSPA 2150)
Change the pitch in the range of plus/minus one octave.
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Semitone Shift
parameter.comment:
Does the same thing as Rate Shift
but allows to set musically sensible pitch shift rates.

parameter.name: Rate Shift
parameter.comment:
Does the same thing as Semitone Shift
but in percentage of the original pitch, so that is closer to a "physical", non-musical approach
